comments.content:
No problem.  
Btw, I still get astonished at in how many voices Futura can speak. Take a bolder weight, set it in all caps, very tightly spaced … and—bang—you get a completely different personality.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626202227im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/futura_6624.png)
  
That’s _one_ family? Wow! :°D

yeah i know, i’ve been checking out the different weights, one minute its art deco minimalism next its big beefy in your face attitude. might be worth investing in the family for its versatility with my university work.  
thanks again!

Jono, if you decide to purchase the Futura family, be sure to check out the [Neufville](http://web.archive.org/web/20080626202227/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/neufville/futura-nd/) cut. Although I haven’t got it yet, it looks great. ATM, I’m partial to Bitstream’s cut.
